author: mharrend
body:
Original pullrequest #2082 was splitted in two requests
LHAPDF: Herwig7 requires two further PDFs
MG5aMC: Herwig7 allows to use it as a ME provider
gengetopt: Herwig7 needs it during compilation
HerwigPP: Removed obsolete patches and a small patch to compile it with our boost version is necessary
title: Herwig7: Config files needed to implement Herwig7
